eos.glitter

3D OpenGL-powered Compositing Window Manager module for EOS Scripting Environment

Brief functions list:

eos.glitter.getScreenCountreturns physical screens count
eos.glitter.window.createcreates a glitter output window
eos.glitter.window.updateupdates a glitter window
eos.glitter.window.setCurrentsets the window as current target for operations
eos.glitter.window.getFpsreturn last fps (frames per second) count made by a given window
eos.glitter.surface.createcreate a new glitter target surface
eos.glitter.surface.createFromObjectcreate a surface from a shared object
eos.glitter.surface.createSubSurfacecreates a new target glitter subsurface
eos.glitter.surface.createSubSurfaceFromObjectcreate a subsurface from a shared object
eos.glitter.surface.addSubSurfaceadds a subsurface to a surface
eos.glitter.surface.removeSubSurfaceremoves a subsurface from a surface
eos.glitter.surface.setPositionsets surface's position
eos.glitter.surface.setOrientationsets surface's orientation
eos.glitter.surface.setScalesets surface scale factor
eos.glitter.surface.setColorsets the surface's color
eos.glitter.surface.rotateByAxisAnglerotates the surface by a given axis and an angle
eos.glitter.surface.rotateByAnglesrotates the surface by three angles

Detailed functions list:

functioneos.glitter.getScreenCount
 returns physical screens count
 Returns:
 count (numeric) number of physical screens
functioneos.glitter.window.create
 creates a glitter output window
 Parameters:
 name (string) screen output screen identifier
 width (numeric) width of the window, in pixels
 height (numeric) height of the window, in pixels
 bpp (numeric) color depth (8-16-24-32)
 antialiasing (numeric) antialiasing level from 0 (off) to 4 (max)
 fullscreen (boolean) true for fullscreen, false for windowed mode
 Returns:
 windowId (numeric) id of the new window
functioneos.glitter.window.update
 updates a glitter window
 Parameters:
 windowId id of the window
 Returns:
 updated (boolean) true or false
functioneos.glitter.window.setCurrent
 sets the window as current target for operations
 Parameters:
 windowId (numeric) id of the window
functioneos.glitter.window.getFps
 return last fps (frames per second) count made by a given window
 Parameters:
 windowId (numeric) id of the window
 Returns:
 fps (numeric) last fps count
functioneos.glitter.surface.create
 create a new glitter target surface
 Returns:
 surfaceId (numeric) id of the new surface
functioneos.glitter.surface.createFromObject
 create a surface from a shared object
 Parameters:
 sharedObject (eosObject) a shared object
 Returns:
 surfaceId (numeric) id of the new surface
functioneos.glitter.surface.createSubSurface
 creates a new target glitter subsurface
 Returns:
 subSurfaceId (numeric) id of the new subsurface
functioneos.glitter.surface.createSubSurfaceFromObject
 create a subsurface from a shared object
 Parameters:
 sharedObject (eosObject) a shared object
 Returns:
 subSurfaceId (numeric) id of the new subsurface
functioneos.glitter.surface.addSubSurface
 adds a subsurface to a surface
 Parameters:
 surfaceId (numeric) surface's id
 subSurfaceId (numeric) subsurface's id
 Returns:
 success (boolean) true or false
functioneos.glitter.surface.removeSubSurface
 removes a subsurface from a surface
 Parameters:
 surfaceId (numeric) surface's id
 subSurfaceId (numeric) subsurface's id
 Returns:
 success (boolean) true or false
functioneos.glitter.surface.setPosition
 sets surface's position
 Parameters:
 surfaceId (numeric) surface's id
 x (numeric) x value
 y (numeric) y value
 z (numeric) z value
functioneos.glitter.surface.setOrientation
 sets surface's orientation
 Parameters:
 surfaceId (numeric) surface's id
 x (numeric) quaternion x value
 y (numeric) quaternion y value
 z (numeric) quaternion z value
 w (numeric) quaternion w value
functioneos.glitter.surface.setScale
 sets surface scale factor
 Parameters:
 surfaceId (numeric) surface's id
 x (numeric) scale factor for X axis
 y (numeric) scale factor for Y axis
 z (numeric) scale factor for Z axis
functioneos.glitter.surface.setColor
 sets the surface's color
 Parameters:
 surfaceId (numeric) surface's id
 r (numeric) red component value (0.0 to 1.0)
 g (numeric) green component value (0.0 to 1.0)
 b (numeric) blue component value (0.0 to 1.0)
 a (numeric) alpha component value (0.0 to 1.0)
functioneos.glitter.surface.rotateByAxisAngle
 rotates the surface by a given axis and an angle
 Parameters:
 surfaceId (numeric) surface's id
 x (numeric) vector X component
 y (numeric) vector Y component
 z (numeric) vector Z component
 a (numeric) rotation angle
functioneos.glitter.surface.rotateByAngles
 rotates the surface by three angles
 Parameters:
 surfaceId (numeric) surface's id
 x (numeric) rotation angle on X axis
 y (numeric) rotation angle on Y axis
 z (numeric) rotation angle on Z axis
